pageContext.claim: “China is -- their supply chain is breaking up. The supply chain of China, which was this unbreakable, powerful tool that they had, is breaking up like a toy because companies are moving out.”
pageContext.analysis: This is highly misleading, as there is little to no evidence supporting Trump's claim that U.S. tariffs are spurring thousands of company closures in China and no evidence that their "supply chain is broken."
